Class BaseShape<BS extends BaseShape<BS>>

  • java.lang.Object

              • ch.nolix.element._3DGUI.BaseShape<BS>
  • Type Parameters:
    BS - The type of a base shape.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController, IFluentObject<BS>, Namable<BS>, Named, OptionalNamable<BS>, OptionalTokenable<BS>, Resettable, Tokenable<BS>, Tokened, Typed, TypeRequestable, Configurable, Specifiable, Specified, IElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cuboid, Sphere

    public abstract class BaseShape<BS extends BaseShape<BS>>
extends Shape<BS>
    A base shape contains no other shapes.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
